entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
